question: Which are the only five countries that have participated in all the Summer Olympic Games?
option1: Australia, France, Great Britain, Greece, Switzerland
option2: United States of America, Australia, France, Great Britain, Switzerland
option3: United States of America, Russia, Great Britain, France, Germany
option4: South Africa, Argentina, Canada, France, Australia
answer: Australia, France, Great Britain, Greece, Switzerland
explanation: Australia, France, Great Britain, Greece, Switzerland are the only five countries that have participated in all the Summer Olympic Games.
